attributes.action: For the king to dissolve parliament and call for a general election.
attributes.additional_details: We have had three Prime Ministers who have not been elected by the people of this nation. Democracy needs to be enacted for this government to have any authority.
attributes.background: For parliament to ask the king to use his royal perogative and dissolve parliament and for a general election to be held.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for an immediate general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
